mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO AS empNo, PHYSIQUE_GRADE AS physiqueGrade, MGROUP , BRANCH , HIERARACHY , MSN , JOIN_ARMY_DAY AS joinArmyDay, DISCHARGE_DAY AS dischargeDay, MILITARY_SEQ AS militarySeq FROM HM_MILITARY_INFO where emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HM_MILITARY_INFO ( EMP_NO , PHYSIQUE_GRADE , MGROUP , BRANCH , HIERARACHY , MSN , JOIN_ARMY_DAY , DISCHARGE_DAY, MILITARY_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{empNo}, #{physiqueGrade}, #{mgroup}, #{branch}, #{hierarachy}, #{msn}, #{joinArmyDay}, #{dischargeDay}, MILITARY_SEQ.nextval )
mapper.update: update HM_MILITARY_INFO set PHYSIQUE_GRADE = #{physiqueGrade}, MGROUP = #{mgroup}, BRANCH = #{branch}, HIERARACHY = #{hierarachy}, MSN = #{msn}, JOIN_ARMY_DAY = #{joinArmyDay}, DISCHARGE_DAY = #{dischargeDay} where EMP_NO = #{empNo} and MILITARY_SEQ = #{militarySeq}
